Body:
"""
    Create a virtual response to return from command

    :param command
    :type command: String
    """
global response
global response_ptr
response_assoc = {'ATD*99***1#': 'CONNECT\r\n', 'AT+CGDATA="PPP",1':
    'CONNECT\r\n', 'AT+CSQ': '+CSQ: 32,99\r\n\r\nOK\r\n', 'AT+CPIN?':
    '+CPIN: READY\r\n', 'AT+CGSN': '123456789\r\nOK\r\n'}
response_str = response_assoc.get(command)
response_ptr = 0
if response_str:
    response = response_str
else:
    response = 'OK\r\n'
